main.sql: select cast(Transliter(fr.fio) as varchar(60)) as EngFio, cast(Transliter(fr.town) as varchar(103))as engTown, cast(Transliter(fr.Coach) as varchar(60))as engCoach, fr.*, c.*, r.sname as divis from finalreport(%IDC%) fr left join Lifter_on_competition loc on loc.id_lifter_compet=fr.loc left join Competit C on c.id_compet=loc.id_compet join Range r on r.id_range = c.id_range %WHERE%
